pages.text: Lava is the probably second-most present fluid. It appears rarely in the overworld, and very often in the $(l:nether/nether)nether$(). When lava touches $(l:fluids/water)water$(), they solidify. See the water entry for more info.$(br2)Lava flows up to 3 blocks far in the overworld and the $(l:end/end)end$(), and up to 7 blocks far and twice as fast in the nether.
